assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Banswara Syntex Limited engages in the manufacture, market, and sale of textile products in India. The company offers spun synthetic blended, wool, and wool mix yarns; and spun synthetic and worsted, and cotton and linen fabrics, as well as readymade garments, such as trousers, jackets, and waistcoats. It also provides shirting and technical, jacquard, and knitted fabrics; polyester, viscose, acrylic, wool, lycra, linen, and high twists yarns; yarn and piece dyeing solutions; and fabrics for men's and women's wear, and home textile furnishing fabrics in various blends. In addition, the company offers performance finish; technical fabrics used for high altitude weather and sports wear; and automotive fabrics for trimming interiors of automobile seats and doors. Further, it provides fire retardant fabrics for that can be used as curtains, upholstery, drapes, wall paneling, cushion covers, and sheets, as well as lining for tents for use in furnishing auditoriums, multiplexes, cinema halls, hotels, railway coaches, airlines, ships and cruise, and buses and coaches. Additionally, the company owns thermal power plant that generates approximately 30 MW of captive power. The company also exports its products to Vietnam, South Korea, Turkey, the United States, the United Kingdom, Bangladesh, South Africa, Mexico, and internationally. Banswara Syntex Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Neeraj  Mishra
companyOfficers.title: VP of Sales & Marketing and Fabrics

companyOfficers.name: Ms. Kavita  Soni
companyOfficers.title: Sr. VP of Corp. Social Responsibility
